content:
For the third day, Russian troops have been carrying out non -nomadic launches and missiles in Ukraine, thus exposing millions of civilians to danger.

About it after the morning Russian rocket attack on KievwroteUS Ambassador to Ukraine Bridget Brink.

“Already the third pre -world morning this week has been announced throughout Ukraine and it is recommended to look for shelters. Russia continues to be unmanaged launches of drones and rockets, not paying attention to millions of civilians and violating international law, ”she stressed.

AsreportedThe armyinform, last day from mortars, tanks and artillery, Rosarmia attacked 12 regions of Ukraine.
title: The US Ambassador responded to massive blows of the Russian Federation in Ukraine
description: This was written after the morning Russian rocket attack on Kiev by the US Ambassador to Ukraine ...
author: Army Inform
